rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C170452

definition: Terminology relevant to the name of the standard described in the Define-XML document.
name: Standard Name

terms.definition: The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Analysis Data Model standard.

A standard terminology developed and maintained by Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) and the National Cancer Institute Enterprise Vocabulary Services (NCI-EVS) to support CDISC models, domains and specifications for data representation in regulated research.
terms.preferredTerm: Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Controlled Terminology
synonyms: Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Controlled Terminology

terms.definition: The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model standard.
The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model Associated Persons standard.
The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model Medical Devices standard.
The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Study Data Tabulation Model Pharmacogenomics/Genetics standard.
The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Standard for the Exchange of Nonclinical Data standard.
The implementation guide for the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) Standard for the Exchange of Nonclinical Data Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology standard.
terms.preferredTerm: SEND Implementation Guide-Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology
